idea-plugin.name: PHP Color Cast
idea-plugin.description:
Customize colors for PHP types.

Highlight specified classes, interfaces, enums,
and all other PHP types with your own colors.

Usage

Set colors for specific types in the plugin settings.
After applying, your code will be highlighted:
  • Property declarations (public CustomType $property)
  • Property references ($object->property)
  • Variables ($variable)

Settings

Control all (type: color) mappings at:
File → Settings → Editor → PHP Color Cast
